name: MOTiVE: Vol 2 Issue 3
description:
The third and final issue of MOTiVE for 2020 provides locations and NPCs in Gokleve, including merchants that have struck deals with the mysterious Others. The rest of the issue contains an adventure that involves rogue tinker witches, the nefarious Vodník of Nix, grafter gangers, redthorn besieged villagers, and a prototype submarine that threatens to turn the tide of power in the Rustwater region! (See issues 1 & 2 for setting details, playbooks and more!) 

This Dungeon World adventure could easily be reskinned for any fantasy RPG. The adventure has 11 monsters and 3 detailed maps. (Unmarked player/VTT suitable maps included.)

Play to find out what happens. 

File Descriptions 

  • Booklet (pdf) - print double-sided (short-edge binding), and staple to create a 'zine
  • Screen (pdf) - single page display
  • Spreads (pdf) - double -page spreads (does not include covers)
  • *.png - map image files for vtt games
